scripts.build: cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --target web --out-dir pkg ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/levenshtein.wasm
scripts.build:nodejs: cargo build --release --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --target nodejs --out-dir pkg-test ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/levenshtein.wasm
